nodes.name: Webhook Trigger - Billing Request
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Accept billing request from Module 03 or manual trigger.
INPUTS: telehealth_record.json or custom billing payload with patient info, service_code, amount.
OUTPUTS: Parsed body as $json.
CONFIG: Set ALLOWED_ORIGINS for CORS, WEBHOOK_ID_BILLING for custom path.
INTEGRATION: Connects to Module 03 output or standalone billing system.
PHI-SAFE: No diagnosis codes or clinical notes required/stored.

nodes.name: Validate Billing Data
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Ensure required billing data present before creating invoice/payment.
INPUTS: Webhook body with patient/customer identifier, amount, service_code.
OUTPUTS: Routes to 'true' if valid, 'false' for validation errors.
VALIDATION: Requires (email OR customer_id), amount > 0, service_code not empty.
CURRENCY: Defaults to DEFAULT_CURRENCY env if not provided.
PHI-SAFE: Only validates billing identifiers, no clinical data required.

parameters.responseBody: ={{ { "success": false, "error": "Missing required billing data", "message": "Required: (patient_email OR customer_id), amount > 0, service_code", "stage": "validation", "trace_id": $now.toMillis().toString(), "timestamp": $now.toISO() } }}

nodes.name: Return Validation Error
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Return 400 error when billing data incomplete or invalid.
INPUTS: Triggered by validation failure.
OUTPUTS: HTTP 400 with error JSON including trace_id for debugging.
ERROR HANDLING: Clear message explaining required fields, includes stage and trace_id.
LOGGING: trace_id allows correlation with datastore error logs.

nodes.name: Prepare Billing Data
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Normalize and structure billing data for payment gateway API.
INPUTS: Validated webhook data.
OUTPUTS: Structured object with customer, billing, membership, metadata.
LOGIC: Generates unique invoice_reference, normalizes currency, handles membership flag.
DEFAULTS: Currency from DEFAULT_CURRENCY env, service_description fallback.
TRACE: Creates trace_id for end-to-end request tracking.
FLEXIBILITY: Handles both patient_email (Module 03) and customer_email (direct calls).

nodes.name: Lookup Customer in Gateway
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Search for existing customer in payment gateway (Stripe or Square).
INPUTS: Prepared customer email from billing data.
OUTPUTS: Customer object if found, empty if not (triggers creation).
PLATFORMS:
  - Stripe: GET /v1/customers/search?query=email:'email@example.com'
  - Square: POST /v2/customers/search with email filter
CREDENTIAL: Uses PAYMENT_GATEWAY_CREDENTIAL_ID (Stripe API key or Square token).
FALLBACK: If not found, next node creates new customer.
ALTERNATES: Can use customer_id directly if provided in input (skip lookup).

nodes.name: Check Customer Exists
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Determine if customer exists or needs creation.
INPUTS: Lookup result from payment gateway.
OUTPUTS: customer_exists flag, customer_id (if found), needs_creation flag.
LOGIC: Parses Stripe or Square response format, extracts customer ID.
DECISION: If customer_id null, next node creates new customer; else proceeds to invoice.
ERROR HANDLING: Handles empty response arrays gracefully.

nodes.name: Check Needs Customer Creation
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Route to customer creation if needed, or skip to invoice creation.
INPUTS: Check result from previous node.
OUTPUTS: True = create customer, False = use existing customer_id.
EFFICIENCY: Avoids unnecessary API call if customer already exists.

nodes.name: Create Customer in Gateway
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Create new customer record in payment gateway.
INPUTS: Customer data from Check Customer Exists node.
OUTPUTS: New customer object with ID.
PLATFORMS:
  - Stripe: POST /v1/customers with email, name, phone, metadata
  - Square: POST /v2/customers with similar structure
METADATA: Tags customer with source='aigent_module_04' for tracking.
USE CASE: First-time patient billing, no existing customer record.

nodes.name: Merge Customer ID
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Consolidate customer_id from either lookup (existing) or creation (new).
INPUTS: Either existing customer_id or newly created customer object.
OUTPUTS: Unified customer_id for invoice creation.
LOGIC: Merges both paths (skip creation / create customer) into single stream.

nodes.name: Extract Customer ID
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Extract customer_id from either existing or newly created customer.
INPUTS: Merged customer data.
OUTPUTS: Unified billing payload with customer_id and all billing details.
LOGIC: Checks both existing path and creation path, handles Stripe/Square format differences.
READY: Output is ready for invoice creation with guaranteed customer_id.

nodes.name: Create Invoice
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Create invoice in payment gateway (Stripe or Square).
INPUTS: Customer ID and billing details.
OUTPUTS: Invoice object with ID and status.
PLATFORMS:
  - Stripe: POST /v1/invoices, then add invoice items, then finalize
  - Square: POST /v2/invoices with line items included
BILLING_MODE:
  - charge_now: auto_advance=true, collection_method=charge_automatically
  - invoice_link: auto_advance=false, collection_method=send_invoice
METADATA: Includes service_code, session_id, trace_id for tracking.
NOTE: Stripe requires separate invoice item creation (next node).

nodes.name: Add Invoice Line Item (Stripe)
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Add line item to Stripe invoice (Stripe-specific step).
INPUTS: Invoice ID from Create Invoice, amount and description from billing data.
OUTPUTS: Invoice item object.
STRIPE FLOW: Invoice â†’ Invoice Item â†’ Finalize â†’ Pay/Link.
SKIP FOR SQUARE: Square invoices include line items in creation request.
AMOUNT: In smallest currency unit (cents for USD).
NEXT: Finalize invoice to make it payable.

nodes.name: Finalize Invoice (Stripe)
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Finalize Stripe invoice to make it payable.
INPUTS: Invoice ID from Create Invoice.
OUTPUTS: Finalized invoice with hosted_invoice_url.
STRIPE FLOW: Draft invoice â†’ Finalize â†’ Ready for payment.
STATUS: Changes invoice status from 'draft' to 'open'.
NEXT: If BILLING_MODE=charge_now, pay invoice; else return hosted_invoice_url.
SKIP FOR SQUARE: Square invoices finalized on creation.

nodes.name: Check Billing Mode
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Route based on BILLING_MODE env variable.
INPUTS: Finalized invoice.
OUTPUTS: True = charge immediately, False = return invoice link.
MODES:
  - charge_now: Charge default payment method immediately (card on file)
  - invoice_link: Generate hosted payment page, send link to customer
USE CASES:
  - charge_now: Returning patients with saved payment methods
  - invoice_link: New patients, custom payment terms, patient preference

nodes.name: Charge Invoice Now
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Immediately charge invoice using default payment method.
INPUTS: Finalized invoice ID.
OUTPUTS: Payment object with charge ID, receipt URL, status.
PLATFORMS:
  - Stripe: POST /v1/invoices/{id}/pay
  - Square: POST /v2/invoices/{id}/pay
REQUIREMENT: Customer must have default payment method on file.
ERROR: If no payment method, returns error (handle in error node).
SUCCESS: paid=true, generates receipt_url, captures payment_id.

nodes.name: Merge Payment Result
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Merge payment result (immediate charge or invoice link) into unified format.
INPUTS: Either charge result (charge_now) or finalized invoice (invoice_link).
OUTPUTS: Unified payment object with invoice_id, payment_id, hosted_invoice_url, paid status.
LOGIC: Handles both billing modes in single stream for downstream processing.

nodes.name: Format Payment Result
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Normalize payment result across gateways and billing modes.
INPUTS: Merged payment data from charge or invoice link.
OUTPUTS: Standardized payment object with invoice_id, payment_id, paid status, URLs.
PLATFORM HANDLING: Parses Stripe vs Square response formats.
MODE HANDLING: Differentiates charge_now (paid=true, receipt_url) vs invoice_link (paid=false, hosted_invoice_url).
READY: Output ready for receipt sending and accounting sync.

parameters.name: Line

nodes.name: Sync to QuickBooks Online
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Create invoice in QuickBooks Online for accounting records.
INPUTS: Formatted payment result with amount, description, invoice reference.
OUTPUTS: QuickBooks invoice object with ID.
API: POST /v3/company/{realmId}/invoice with customer, line items, date.
AMOUNT: Convert from cents to dollars (divide by 100).
CUSTOMER: Uses default customer ID '1' (configure per practice in QBO).
ITEM: Uses default service item ID '1' (configure income account in QBO).
ALTERNATE: If ACCOUNTING_TARGET=practicesuite, skip this node.
NEXT: If paid=true, create payment record in QBO.

nodes.name: Send Receipt Email
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Email receipt or invoice to customer.
INPUTS: Formatted payment result with customer email, amount, status.
OUTPUTS: SendGrid message ID.
CONTENT:
  - If paid=true: Payment receipt with receipt_url link
  - If paid=false: Invoice with hosted_invoice_url pay button
DESIGN: Branded HTML template with clinic colors, clear amount display, payment status.
BUTTON: View Receipt (paid) or Pay Invoice (pending).
SUPPORT: Contact email for billing questions.

nodes.name: Send Receipt SMS (Optional)
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Send SMS receipt or payment link to customer (optional, based on SEND_SMS_RECEIPT env).
INPUTS: Formatted payment result with customer phone, amount, status.
OUTPUTS: Twilio message SID.
CONTENT:
  - If paid: Receipt confirmation with receipt link
  - If not paid: Payment request with invoice link
ENABLE: Set SEND_SMS_RECEIPT=true to activate this node.
SKIP: If phone number missing, node fails gracefully (handle in error node).

nodes.name: Merge All Results
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Consolidate all outputs (payment, accounting, receipt deliveries) into final response.
INPUTS: Payment result, QuickBooks invoice, email delivery, SMS delivery.
OUTPUTS: Unified result object with all metadata.
USE CASE: Provides complete execution summary for response and monitoring.

parameters.responseBody:
={{ {
  success: true,
  invoice_id: $('Format Payment Result').first().json.invoice_id,
  payment_id: $('Format Payment Result').first().json.payment_id,
  accounting_id: $('Sync to QuickBooks Online').first().json?.Invoice?.Id || null,
  gateway: $('Format Payment Result').first().json.gateway,
  amount: $('Format Payment Result').first().json.amount,
  currency: $('Format Payment Result').first().json.currency,
  paid: $('Format Payment Result').first().json.paid,
  customer_email: $('Format Payment Result').first().json.customer_email,
  customer_name: $('Format Payment Result').first().json.customer_name,
  customer_id: $('Format Payment Result').first().json.customer_id,
  hosted_invoice_url: $('Format Payment Result').first().json.hosted_invoice_url,
  receipt_url: $('Format Payment Result').first().json.receipt_url,
  invoice_reference: $('Format Payment Result').first().json.invoice_reference,
  membership: $('Format Payment Result').first().json.membership,
  metadata: {
    crm_updated: false,
    receipt_sent: $('Send Receipt Email').first().json?.messageId ? true : false,
    sms_sent: $env.SEND_SMS_RECEIPT === 'true' && $('Send Receipt SMS (Optional)').first().json?.sid ? true : false,
    synced_to_accounting: $('Sync to QuickBooks Online').first().json?.Invoice?.Id ? true : false,
    session_id: $('Format Payment Result').first().json.metadata.session_id,
    trace_id: $('Format Payment Result').first().json.trace_id,
    timestamp: $now.toISO()
  }
} }}

nodes.name: Return Success Response
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Return standardized invoice_record.json to caller.
INPUTS: Merged final results.
OUTPUTS: HTTP 200 with complete billing record including invoice_id, payment_id, accounting_id, URLs, metadata.
FORMAT: Follows invoice_record.json schema for Module 05 integration.
METADATA: Includes delivery statuses, trace_id for debugging, timestamp.
INTEGRATION: Output ready for Module 05 (Follow-Up & Retention) or analytics systems.

nodes.name: Error Handler
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Catch execution errors (API failures, payment declines, network issues).
INPUTS: Any upstream error from payment gateway, accounting, or comms nodes.
OUTPUTS: Error details for logging service.
BEST PRACTICE: Connect to error notification workflow or logging service in production.
RECOVERY: Log error with trace_id to datastore, notify staff of failed billing.
CRITICAL: Payment failures require immediate staff attention for manual processing.

meta.description: Aigent Universal Clinic Template - Module 04: Billing & Payments. Accepts service completion data from Module 03, creates invoice in Stripe/Square, charges payment or generates hosted link, sends receipt email/SMS, syncs to QuickBooks Online accounting. Returns standardized invoice_record.json with payment status and IDs.
